name: AcademiaPro
description: AcademiaPro is a course management platform that streamlines communication between teachers and students. It offers features like class schedules, assignment submissions, and grading.
challengesFaced: Managing complex data relationships between users, courses, and assignments
Ensuring smooth form validation and data consistency
futurePlans: Add real-time chat between teachers and students
Build a mobile-friendly version of the app

name: ProjectBuddies
description: ProjectBuddies is a collaboration platform where developers can find and join projects. Users can create projects, invite others, or browse open projects to join.
challengesFaced: Designing an intuitive UI for project discovery and collaboration
Maintaining secure user authentication with role-based logic
Handling large-scale user and project data effectively
futurePlans: Add team chat and file-sharing functionality
Implement a rating system for contributors

name: AppEmphorium
description: AppEmphorium is an online marketplace for showcasing and selling web and mobile applications. Developers can list apps, and users can browse and explore featured applications.
challengesFaced: Setting up Firebase for authentication and hosting
Creating a responsive and aesthetic grid layout for app listings
Ensuring scalability for large numbers of app uploads
futurePlans: Add payment integration for buying/selling apps
Introduce advanced filtering and search options
